channel.title: Time between each npc spawn?
channel.description:
basically title says it;
How do i change the time in which the npc spawns?
eg, on dodian the main boss dies, then re-spawns after 250seconds.
How do i set a time for my npcs to respawn?
all help appreciated! [EXCEPT NON-RELAVANT STUFF ;)]

item.title: Time between each npc spawn?
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Go into npc.cfg and search for monsters name with underscores instead of spaces or just search his id. There will be npcid name combat health ( not sure which one comes first) but at the end of each line you press tab and type how many seconds you want between spawns.

Read full topic
